Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/71st
ShortDescription: 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey, 67th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffrey, 67th and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/71st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Clark/Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Clark/Division. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
